categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Sanna was a member of the Rebel Alliance. A short Human female with curly hair, she helped establish a strike base on the Combat Moon. During a skirmish between locals and the Empire, the leader of the base was reluctant to intercede, fearing discovery. Sanna convinced him to help, and their actions resulted in the Imperials being routed, though the base had to be abandoned.
